ca.mcgill.ecse321.scorekeeper.model

Class League

  • java.lang.Object
    • ca.mcgill.ecse321.scorekeeper.model.League

  • public class League
extends java.lang.Object
    Domain object that stores data relating to the League. Teams, Games, and Players are all tracked by the Leage. Their statistics are amalgamated by the League.
    See Also:
    Team, Game, Player
